txt.en: 'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
The leader of the Metalsmith's Guild has asked you to create a chainmail hauberk to help show the apprentices what good mail should look like.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nCreate a guild-pattern chainmail hauberk.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern chainmail hauberk

'Good news: We have a lot of new apprentices in the guild. Bad news: They are progressing slower than I'd like. Make them some examples of real armour. Give them something to aspire to. Let's start with chainmail. Everyone thinks it's easy to make, but you and I know that the difference between good mail and bad mail is the difference between life and death.'
'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
What a fine example for the apprentices.
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern chainmail hauberk

'Good news: We have a lot of new apprentices in the guild. Bad news: They are progressing slower than I'd like. Make them some examples of real armour. Give them something to aspire to. Let's start with chainmail. Everyone thinks it's easy to make, but you and I know that the difference between good mail and bad mail is the difference between life and death.'
Turn in a guild-pattern chainmail hauberk ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Hávar
'Wonderful! Let me put this on and have an apprentice take a swing at me. I'll stand by your craftsmanship any day.'
Talk to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern chainmail hauberk ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'Wonderful! Let me put this on and have an apprentice take a swing at me. I'll stand by your craftsmanship any day.'
